_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Generic Java pro
author: sneaky@sneakyhub.com
description:
Creates a container that runs java.

Java를 실행하는 컨테이너를 생성합니다.
startup: CPU_THREADS=$CPU_COUNT; if [ -f /sys/fs/cgroup/cpu.max ]; then CG=$(cat /sys/fs/cgroup/cpu.max); if [ "$(echo $CG | cut -d' ' -f1)" != "max" ]; then CPU_THREADS=$(($(echo $CG | cut -d' ' -f1) / $(echo $CG | cut -d' ' -f2))); fi; elif [ -f /sys/fs/cgroup/cpu/cpu.cfs_quota_us ]; then Q=$(cat /sys/fs/cgroup/cpu/cpu.cfs_quota_us); P=$(cat /sys/fs/cgroup/cpu/cpu.cfs_period_us); if [ "$Q" != "-1" ]; then CPU_THREADS=$((Q / P)); fi; fi; [ $CPU_THREADS -lt 1 ] && CPU_THREADS=1; PGCT=$((CPU_THREADS * 3 / 10)); [ $PGCT -lt 1 ] && PGCT=1; CGCT=$((CPU_THREADS * 9 / 10)); [ $CGCT -lt 1 ] && CGCT=1; java -Xms$(({{SERVER_MEMORY}} / 2))M -Xmx$(({{SERVER_MEMORY}} * 9 / 10))M -XX:+UseG1GC -XX:+ParallelRefProcEnabled -XX:MaxGCPauseMillis=200 -XX:+UnlockExperimentalVMOptions -XX:+DisableExplicitGC -XX:+AlwaysPreTouch -XX:G1NewSizePercent=30 -XX:G1MaxNewSizePercent=40 -XX:G1HeapRegionSize=8M -XX:G1ReservePercent=20 -XX:G1HeapWastePercent=5 -XX:G1MixedGCCountTarget=4 -XX:InitiatingHeapOccupancyPercent=15 -XX:G1MixedGCLiveThresholdPercent=90 -XX:G1RSetUpdatingPauseTimePercent=5 -XX:SurvivorRatio=32 -XX:+PerfDisableSharedMem -XX:MaxTenuringThreshold=1 -XX:ParallelGCThreads=$PGCT -XX:ConcGCThreads=$CGCT -Dterminal.jline=false -Dterminal.ansi=true -jar {{JARFILE}}

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Java Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
PROJECT=java

apt update
apt install -y curl jq

cd /mnt/server

variables.name: JAR FILE
variables.description:
실행할 JAR 파일 이름입니다.

Name of the JAR file to run.

variables.name: CPU Count
variables.description:
서버에 할당된 CPU 스레드 수입니다. GC 스레드 계산에 사용됩니다.

Number of CPU threads allocated to the server. Used for GC thread calculation.
